org.openadaptor.core.router
Interface IRoutingMap

All Known Implementing Classes:
RoutingMap
public interface IRoutingMap

Represents a class which holds a routing configuration for processing data, discarded data and exceptions. For a given source of data it will determine the list of IMessageProcessors to pass that data onto. The Response from each IMessageProcessor will in turn be routed according to the RoutingMap.

Author:
perryj
See Also:
Router, Pipeline
